book.synopsis: Mitch Smith is an ambitious young man. He wants to work the coolest clubs, date the hottest girls, do the hardest drugs. But when a one night stand with Ònice girlÓ Amy Peterson threatens to become something more, Mitch must decide between an actual relationship or the continued pursuit of the unattainable.
